00007 FSMQueenAIControl::FSMQueenAIControl(Queen* queen)
00008 {
00009         m_queen = queen;
00010         m_queen_machine = new FSMQueenMachine(FSM_MACH_BEE);
00011         StateFollowQueen* idle = new StateFollowQueen();
00012         m_queen_machine->AddState(idle);
00013         m_queen_machine->AddState(new StatePowerUp());
00014         m_queen_machine->AddState(new StateDead());
00015         m_queen_machine->SetDefaultState(idle);
00016 }

00018 void FSMQueenAIControl::Update(int t)
00019 {
00020         if(!m_queen)
00021         {
00022                 m_queen_machine->Reset();
00023                 return;
00024         }
00025         
00026         UpdatePerceptions(t);
00027         m_queen_machine->UpdateMachine(t);
00028 }

00030 void FSMQueenAIControl::UpdatePerceptions(int t)
00031 {
00032         m_nearestEnemy = NULL; //Game.getClosestGameObj(m_queen,GameObj::OBJ_ENEMY)
00033         m_nearestPowerUp = NULL; //Game.getClosestPowerUp(m_queen, GameObj::OBJ_POWERUP)
00034 
00035         //bee collision determination
00036         m_willCollide = false;
00037 
00038         if(m_willCollide)
00039                 m_safetyRadius = 30.0f;
00040         else
00041                 m_safetyRadius = 15.0f;
00042 
00043         if(m_nearestEnemy)
00044         {
00045                 float speed = 0; //m_queen->m_velocity.Norm
00046                 m_nearestEnemyDist = 0; //m_nearestEnemy->m_position.Distance(m_queen->m_poistion)
00047 
00048                 float dotVel;
00049                 NiPoint3 normDelta(0,0,0); //m_nearestEnemy->m_position - m_queen->m_position;
00050                 normDelta.Unitize(); //I am guessing this means Normalize???
00051 
00052                 float enemySpeed = 0; //m_nearestEnemy->m_velocity.Norm()
00053 
00054                 if(speed > enemySpeed)
00055                         dotVel = 0; //DOT(m_queen->UnitVectorVelocity(),normDelta);
00056                 else
00057                 {
00058                         speed = enemySpeed;
00059                         dotVel = 0; //DOT(m_nearestEnemy->UnitVectorVelocity(),normDelta);
00060 
00061                 }
00062                 float speedAdj = 0; //LERP(speed/AI_MAX_SPEED,0.0f,50.0f)*dotVel
00063                 float adjSafetyRadius = 0; //m_safetyRadius + speedAdj + m_nearestEnemy->m_size
00064 
00065                 if(m_nearestEnemyDist <= adjSafetyRadius && dotVel > 0)
00066                         m_willCollide = true;
00067         }
00068 
00069         if(m_nearestPowerUp)
00070         {
00071                 m_nearestPowerUpDist = 0; //m_nearestPowerUp->m_position.Distance(m_queen->m_position)
00072 
00073                 if(m_nearestPowerUpDist <= POWERUP_SCAN_DIST)
00074                 {
00075                         m_powerUpNear = true;
00076                 }
00077 
00078         }
00079 
00080 
00081 }
